events.text: [shake rate=2 level =3]Hellurrrrrrrr[/shake]. Nice to meet you, kid. Name is Mica, but you can call me how it fits you, I don't care.

events.question: So, you are here to become a member of the gang? Hah, you're acepted!!!!!!!! Yeah, just like that.

events.choice: Oh, that was easy... What do I get as a gangster?

events.text:
You get to be part of a family, like in the mafia. But we just hang out and have afternoon coffee together.
Its cool, it helps keep solitude away.
Anyways bye

events.choice: I'm here for a diving helmet

events.text:
I see. And you should, yours is a bit rusty, that will give you salmonella.
You can never be too careful when it comes to that.
But I don't know where you can get one. I got my helmet in the sewers while I was working out
Good luck, though
